alert.note: Alert for Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 4:22PM MST until July 28 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Santa Cruz County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 421 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Patagonia, or 22 miles northeast of Nogales, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nogales, Tubac, Rio Rico, Patagonia, Sonoita, Elgin, Patagonia Lake State Park, Nogales International Airport, Tumacacori, Amado, Kino Springs, Canelo, Lochiel and Madera Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
